00050 static CustomData *bpy_bm_customdata_get(BMesh *bm, char htype)
00051 {
00052     switch (htype) {
00053         case BM_VERT:  return &bm->vdata;
00054         case BM_EDGE:  return &bm->edata;
00055         case BM_FACE:  return &bm->pdata;
00056         case BM_LOOP:  return &bm->ldata;
00057     }
00058 
00059     BLI_assert(0);
00060     return NULL;
00061 }
00062 
00063 static CustomDataLayer *bpy_bmlayeritem_get(BPy_BMLayerItem *self)
00064 {
00065     CustomData *data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00066     const int index_absolute = CustomData_get_layer_index_n(data, self->type, self->index);
00067     if (index_absolute != -1) {
00068         return &data->layers[index_absolute];
00069     }
00070     else {
00071         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError,
00072                         "layer has become invalid");
00073         return NULL;
00074     }
00075 }

00116 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayeraccess_collection_get(BPy_BMLayerAccess *self, void *flag)
00117 {
00118     const int type = (int)GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(flag);
00119 
00120     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00121 
00122     return BPy_BMLayerCollection_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, type);
00123 }

00126 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmlayercollection_active_doc,
00127 "This meshes vert sequence (read-only).\n\n:type: :class:`BMVertSeq`"
00128 );
00129 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_active_get(BPy_BMLayerItem *self, void *UNUSED(flag))
00130 {
00131     CustomData *data;
00132     int index;
00133 
00134     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00135 
00136     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00137     index = CustomData_get_active_layer_index(data, self->type); /* absolute */
00138 
00139     if (index != -1) {
00140         index -= CustomData_get_layer_index(data, self->type); /* make relative */
00141         return BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, index);
00142     }
00143     else {
00144         Py_RETURN_NONE;
00145     }
00146 }

00149 "The layers unique name (read-only).\n\n:type: string"
00150 );
00151 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayeritem_name_get(BPy_BMLayerItem *self, void *UNUSED(flag))
00152 {
00153     CustomDataLayer *layer;
00154 
00155     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00156 
00157     layer = bpy_bmlayeritem_get(self);
00158     if (layer) {
00159         return PyUnicode_FromString(layer->name);
00160     }
00161     else {
00162         return NULL;
00163     }
00164 }

00234 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmlayercollection_new_doc,
00235 ".. method:: new(name)\n"
00236 "\n"
00237 "   Create a new layer\n"
00238 "\n"
00239 "   :arg name: Optional name argument (will be made unique).\n"
00240 "   :type name: string\n"
00241 "   :return: The newly created layer.\n"
00242 "   :rtype: :class:`BMLayerItem`\n"
00243 );
00244 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_new(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, PyObject *args)
00245 {
00246     const char *name = NULL;
00247     int index;
00248     CustomData *data;
00249 
00250     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00251 
00252     if (!PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "|s:new", &name)) {
00253         return NULL;
00254     }
00255 
00256     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00257 
00258     if (name) {
00259         BM_data_layer_add_named(self->bm, data, self->type, name);
00260     }
00261     else {
00262         BM_data_layer_add(self->bm, data, self->type);
00263     }
00264 
00265     index = CustomData_number_of_layers(data, self->type) - 1;
00266     BLI_assert(index >= 0);
00267 
00268     return BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, index);
00269 }
00270 
00271 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmlayercollection_remove_doc,
00272 ".. method:: remove(layer)\n"
00273 "\n"
00274 "   Remove a layer\n"
00275 "\n"
00276 "   :arg layer: The layer to remove.\n"
00277 "   :type layer: :class:`BMLayerItem`\n"
00278 );
00279 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_remove(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, BPy_BMLayerItem *value)
00280 {
00281     CustomData *data;
00282 
00283     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00284 
00285     if (!BPy_BMLayerItem_Check(value)) {
00286         PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError,
00287                      "layers.remove(x): expected BMLayerItem, not '%.200s'",
00288                      Py_TYPE(value)->tp_name);
00289         return NULL;
00290     }
00291 
00292     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(value);
00293 
00294     if ((self->bm != value->bm) ||
00295         (self->type != value->type) ||
00296         (self->htype != value->htype))
00297     {
00298         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,
00299                         "layers.remove(x): x not in layers");
00300     }
00301 
00302     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00303     BM_data_layer_free_n(self->bm, data, self->type, value->index);
00304 
00305     Py_RETURN_NONE;
00306 }
00307

00309 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmlayercollection_keys_doc,
00310 ".. method:: keys()\n"
00311 "\n"
00312 "   Return the identifiers of collection members\n"
00313 "   (matching pythons dict.keys() functionality).\n"
00314 "\n"
00315 "   :return: the identifiers for each member of this collection.\n"
00316 "   :rtype: list of strings\n"
00317 );
00318 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_keys(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self)
00319 {
00320     PyObject *ret;
00321     PyObject *item;
00322     int index;
00323     CustomData *data;
00324 
00325     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00326 
00327     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00328     index = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, self->type); /* absolute, but no need to make relative */
00329 
00330     ret = PyList_New(0);
00331 
00332     if (index != -1) {
00333         int tot = CustomData_number_of_layers(data, self->type);
00334         for ( ; tot-- > 0; index++) {
00335             item = PyUnicode_FromString(data->layers[index].name);
00336             PyList_Append(ret, item);
00337             Py_DECREF(item);
00338         }
00339     }
00340 
00341     return ret;
00342 }
00343 
00344 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmlayercollection_values_doc,
00345 ".. method:: items()\n"
00346 "\n"
00347 "   Return the identifiers of collection members\n"
00348 "   (matching pythons dict.items() functionality).\n"
00349 "\n"
00350 "   :return: (key, value) pairs for each member of this collection.\n"
00351 "   :rtype: list of tuples\n"
00352 );
00353 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_values(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self)
00354 {
00355     PyObject *ret;
00356     PyObject *item;
00357     int index;
00358     CustomData *data;
00359 
00360     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00361 
00362     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00363     index = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, self->type);
00364 
00365     ret = PyList_New(0);
00366 
00367     if (index != -1) {
00368         int tot = CustomData_number_of_layers(data, self->type);
00369         for ( ; tot-- > 0; index++) {
00370             item = PyTuple_New(2);
00371             PyTuple_SET_ITEM(item, 0, PyUnicode_FromString(data->layers[index].name));
00372             PyTuple_SET_ITEM(item, 1, BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, index));
00373             PyList_Append(ret, item);
00374             Py_DECREF(item);
00375         }
00376     }
00377 
00378     return ret;
00379 }

00384 "   Return the values of collection\n"

00390 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_items(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self)
00391 {
00392     PyObject *ret;
00393     PyObject *item;
00394     int index;
00395     CustomData *data;
00396 
00397     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00398 
00399     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00400     index = CustomData_get_layer_index(data, self->type);
00401 
00402     ret = PyList_New(0);
00403 
00404     if (index != -1) {
00405         int tot = CustomData_number_of_layers(data, self->type);
00406         for ( ; tot-- > 0; index++) {
00407             item = BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, index);
00408             PyList_Append(ret, item);
00409             Py_DECREF(item);
00410         }
00411     }
00412 
00413     return ret;
00414 }
00415 
00416 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bmlayercollection_get_doc,
00417 ".. method:: get(key, default=None)\n"
00418 "\n"
00419 "   Returns the value of the layer matching the key or default\n"
00420 "   when not found (matches pythons dictionary function of the same name).\n"
00421 "\n"
00422 "   :arg key: The key associated with the layer.\n"
00423 "   :type key: string\n"
00424 "   :arg default: Optional argument for the value to return if\n"
00425 "      *key* is not found.\n"
00426 "   :type default: Undefined\n"
00427 );
00428 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_get(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, PyObject *args)
00429 {
00430     const char *key;
00431     PyObject *def = Py_None;
00432 
00433     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00434 
00435     if (!PyArg_ParseTuple(args, "s|O:get", &key, &def)) {
00436         return NULL;
00437     }
00438     else {
00439         CustomData *data;
00440         int index;
00441 
00442         data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00443         index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(data, self->type, key); /* absolute index */
00444 
00445         if (index != -1) {
00446             index -= CustomData_get_layer_index(data, self->type); /* make relative */
00447             return BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, index);
00448         }
00449     }
00450 
00451     return Py_INCREF(def), def;
00452 }

00470 static Py_ssize_t bpy_bmlayercollection_length(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self)
00471 {
00472     CustomData *data;
00473 
00474     BPY_BM_CHECK_INT(self);
00475 
00476     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00477 
00478     return CustomData_number_of_layers(data, self->type);
00479 }
00480 
00481 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_str(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, const char *keyname)
00482 {
00483     CustomData *data;
00484     int index;
00485 
00486     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00487 
00488     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00489     index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(data, self->type, keyname); /* absolute */
00490 
00491     if (index != -1) {
00492         index -= CustomData_get_layer_index(data, self->type); /* make relative */
00493         return BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, index);
00494     }
00495     else {
00496         PyErr_Format(PyExc_KeyError,
00497                      "BMLayerCollection[key]: key \"%.200s\" not found", keyname);
00498         return NULL;
00499     }
00500 }
00501 
00502 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_int(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, int keynum)
00503 {
00504     Py_ssize_t len;
00505     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00506 
00507     len = bpy_bmlayercollection_length(self);
00508 
00509     if (keynum < 0) keynum += len;
00510     if (keynum >= 0) {
00511         if (keynum < len) {
00512             return BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, keynum);
00513         }
00514     }
00515 
00516     PyErr_Format(PyExc_IndexError,
00517                  "BMLayerCollection[index]: index %d out of range", keynum);
00518     return NULL;
00519 }
00520 
00521 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_slice(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, Py_ssize_t start, Py_ssize_t stop)
00522 {
00523     Py_ssize_t len = bpy_bmlayercollection_length(self);
00524     int count = 0;
00525 
00526     PyObject *tuple;
00527 
00528     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00529 
00530     if (start >= len) start = len - 1;
00531     if (stop  >= len) stop  = len - 1;
00532 
00533     tuple = PyTuple_New(stop - start);
00534 
00535     for (count = start; count < stop; count++) {
00536         PyTuple_SET_ITEM(tuple, count - start, BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(self->bm, self->htype, self->type, count));
00537     }
00538 
00539     return tuple;
00540 }
00541 
00542 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, PyObject *key)
00543 {
00544     /* don't need error check here */
00545     if (PyUnicode_Check(key)) {
00546         return bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_str(self, _PyUnicode_AsString(key));
00547     }
00548     else if (PyIndex_Check(key)) {
00549         Py_ssize_t i = PyNumber_AsSsize_t(key, PyExc_IndexError);
00550         if (i == -1 && PyErr_Occurred())
00551             return NULL;
00552         return bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_int(self, i);
00553     }
00554     else if (PySlice_Check(key)) {
00555         PySliceObject *key_slice = (PySliceObject *)key;
00556         Py_ssize_t step = 1;
00557 
00558         if (key_slice->step != Py_None && !_PyEval_SliceIndex(key, &step)) {
00559             return NULL;
00560         }
00561         else if (step != 1) {
00562             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError,
00563                             "BMLayerCollection[slice]: slice steps not supported");
00564             return NULL;
00565         }
00566         else if (key_slice->start == Py_None && key_slice->stop == Py_None) {
00567             return bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_slice(self, 0, PY_SSIZE_T_MAX);
00568         }
00569         else {
00570             Py_ssize_t start = 0, stop = PY_SSIZE_T_MAX;
00571 
00572             /* avoid PySlice_GetIndicesEx because it needs to know the length ahead of time. */
00573             if (key_slice->start != Py_None && !_PyEval_SliceIndex(key_slice->start, &start)) return NULL;
00574             if (key_slice->stop != Py_None && !_PyEval_SliceIndex(key_slice->stop, &stop))    return NULL;
00575 
00576             if (start < 0 || stop < 0) {
00577                 /* only get the length for negative values */
00578                 Py_ssize_t len = bpy_bmlayercollection_length(self);
00579                 if (start < 0) start += len;
00580                 if (stop < 0) start += len;
00581             }
00582 
00583             if (stop - start <= 0) {
00584                 return PyTuple_New(0);
00585             }
00586             else {
00587                 return bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_slice(self, start, stop);
00588             }
00589         }
00590     }
00591     else {
00592         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_AttributeError,
00593                         "BMLayerCollection[key]: invalid key, key must be an int");
00594         return NULL;
00595     }
00596 }
00597 
00598 static int bpy_bmlayercollection_contains(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self, PyObject *value)
00599 {
00600     const char *keyname = _PyUnicode_AsString(value);
00601     CustomData *data;
00602     int index;
00603 
00604     BPY_BM_CHECK_INT(self);
00605 
00606     if (keyname == NULL) {
00607         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError,
00608                         "BMLayerCollection.__contains__: expected a string");
00609         return -1;
00610     }
00611 
00612     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(self->bm, self->htype);
00613     index = CustomData_get_named_layer_index(data, self->type, keyname);
00614 
00615     return (index != -1) ? 1 : 0;
00616 }
00617 
00618 static PySequenceMethods bpy_bmlayercollection_as_sequence = {
00619     (lenfunc)bpy_bmlayercollection_length,       /* sq_length */
00620     NULL,                                        /* sq_concat */
00621     NULL,                                        /* sq_repeat */
00622     (ssizeargfunc)bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_int, /* sq_item */ /* Only set this so PySequence_Check() returns True */
00623     NULL,                                        /* sq_slice */
00624     (ssizeobjargproc)NULL,                       /* sq_ass_item */
00625     NULL,                                        /* *was* sq_ass_slice */
00626     (objobjproc)bpy_bmlayercollection_contains,  /* sq_contains */
00627     (binaryfunc) NULL,                           /* sq_inplace_concat */
00628     (ssizeargfunc) NULL,                         /* sq_inplace_repeat */
00629 };
00630 
00631 static PyMappingMethods bpy_bmlayercollection_as_mapping = {
00632     (lenfunc)bpy_bmlayercollection_length,       /* mp_length */
00633     (binaryfunc)bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript, /* mp_subscript */
00634     (objobjargproc)NULL,                         /* mp_ass_subscript */
00635 };
00636 
00637 /* Iterator
00638  * -------- */
00639 
00640 static PyObject *bpy_bmlayercollection_iter(BPy_BMLayerCollection *self)
00641 {
00642     /* fake it with a list iterator */
00643     PyObject *ret;
00644     PyObject *iter = NULL;
00645 
00646     BPY_BM_CHECK_OBJ(self);
00647 
00648     ret = bpy_bmlayercollection_subscript_slice(self, 0, PY_SSIZE_T_MIN);
00649 
00650     if (ret) {
00651         iter = PyObject_GetIter(ret);
00652         Py_DECREF(ret);
00653     }
00654 
00655     return iter;
00656 }

00680 
00681 PyObject *BPy_BMLayerAccess_CreatePyObject(BMesh *bm, const char htype)
00682 {
00683     BPy_BMLayerAccess *self;
00684     PyTypeObject *type;
00685 
00686     switch (htype) {
00687         case BM_VERT:  type = &BPy_BMLayerAccessVert_Type;  break;
00688         case BM_EDGE:  type = &BPy_BMLayerAccessEdge_Type;  break;
00689         case BM_FACE:  type = &BPy_BMLayerAccessFace_Type;  break;
00690         case BM_LOOP:  type = &BPy_BMLayerAccessLoop_Type;  break;
00691         default:
00692         {
00693             BLI_assert(0);
00694             type = NULL;
00695             break;
00696         }
00697     }
00698 
00699     self = PyObject_New(BPy_BMLayerAccess, type);
00700     self->bm = bm;
00701     self->htype = htype;
00702     return (PyObject *)self;
00703 }

00706 {
00707     BPy_BMLayerCollection *self = PyObject_New(BPy_BMLayerCollection, &BPy_BMLayerCollection_Type);
00708     self->bm = bm;
00709     self->htype = htype;
00710     self->type = type;
00711     return (PyObject *)self;

00717     self->bm = bm;

00719     self->type = type;
00720     self->index = index;
00721     return (PyObject *)self;

00796 
00797 
00798 /* Per Element Get/Set
00799  * ******************* */
00800 
00804 static void *bpy_bmlayeritem_ptr_get(BPy_BMElem *py_ele, BPy_BMLayerItem *py_layer)
00805 {
00806     void *value;
00807     BMElem *ele = py_ele->ele;
00808     CustomData *data;
00809 
00810     /* error checking */
00811     if (UNLIKELY(!BPy_BMLayerItem_Check(py_layer))) {
00812         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_AttributeError,
00813                         "BMElem[key]: invalid key, must be a BMLayerItem");
00814         return NULL;
00815     }
00816     else if (UNLIKELY(py_ele->bm != py_layer->bm)) {
00817         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,
00818                         "BMElem[layer]: layer is from another mesh");
00819         return NULL;
00820     }
00821     else if (UNLIKELY(ele->head.htype != py_layer->htype)) {
00822         char namestr_1[32], namestr_2[32];
00823         PyErr_Format(PyExc_ValueError,
00824                      "Layer/Element type mismatch, expected %.200s got layer type %.200s",
00825                      BPy_BMElem_StringFromHType_ex(ele->head.htype, namestr_1),
00826                      BPy_BMElem_StringFromHType_ex(py_layer->htype, namestr_2));
00827         return NULL;
00828     }
00829 
00830     data = bpy_bm_customdata_get(py_layer->bm, py_layer->htype);
00831 
00832     value = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(data, ele->head.data, py_layer->type, py_layer->index);
00833 
00834     if (UNLIKELY(value == NULL)) {
00835         /* this should be fairly unlikely but possible if layers move about after we get them */
00836         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_KeyError,
00837                         "BMElem[key]: layer not found");
00838         return NULL;
00839     }
00840     else {
00841         return value;
00842     }
00843 }
00844 
00845 
00853 PyObject *BPy_BMLayerItem_GetItem(BPy_BMElem *py_ele, BPy_BMLayerItem *py_layer)
00854 {
00855     void *value = bpy_bmlayeritem_ptr_get(py_ele, py_layer);
00856     PyObject *ret;
00857 
00858     if (UNLIKELY(value == NULL)) {
00859         return NULL;
00860     }
00861 
00862     switch (py_layer->type) {
00863         case CD_MDEFORMVERT:
00864         {
00865             ret = BPy_BMDeformVert_CreatePyObject(value);
00866             break;
00867         }
00868         case CD_PROP_FLT:
00869         {
00870             ret = PyFloat_FromDouble(*(float *)value);
00871             break;
00872         }
00873         case CD_PROP_INT:
00874         {
00875             ret = PyLong_FromSsize_t((Py_ssize_t)(*(int *)value));
00876             break;
00877         }
00878         case CD_PROP_STR:
00879         {
00880             MStringProperty *mstring = value;
00881             ret = PyBytes_FromStringAndSize(mstring->s, BLI_strnlen(mstring->s, sizeof(mstring->s)));
00882             break;
00883         }
00884         case CD_MTEXPOLY:
00885         {
00886             ret = Py_NotImplemented; /* TODO */
00887             Py_INCREF(ret);
00888             break;
00889         }
00890         case CD_MLOOPUV:
00891         {
00892             ret = BPy_BMLoopUV_CreatePyObject(value);
00893             break;
00894         }
00895         case CD_MLOOPCOL:
00896         {
00897             ret = BPy_BMLoopColor_CreatePyObject(value);
00898             break;
00899         }
00900         case CD_SHAPEKEY:
00901         {
00902             ret = Vector_CreatePyObject((float *)value, 3, Py_WRAP, NULL);
00903             break;
00904         }
00905         case CD_BWEIGHT:
00906         {
00907             ret = PyFloat_FromDouble(*(float *)value);
00908             break;
00909         }
00910         case CD_CREASE:
00911         {
00912             ret = PyFloat_FromDouble(*(float *)value);
00913             break;
00914         }
00915         default:
00916         {
00917             ret = Py_NotImplemented; /* TODO */
00918             Py_INCREF(ret);
00919             break;
00920         }
00921     }
00922 
00923     return ret;
00924 }
00925 
00926 int BPy_BMLayerItem_SetItem(BPy_BMElem *py_ele, BPy_BMLayerItem *py_layer, PyObject *py_value)
00927 {
00928     int ret = 0;
00929     void *value = bpy_bmlayeritem_ptr_get(py_ele, py_layer);
00930 
00931     if (UNLIKELY(value == NULL)) {
00932         return -1;
00933     }
00934 
00935     switch (py_layer->type) {
00936         case CD_MDEFORMVERT:
00937         {
00938             ret = BPy_BMDeformVert_AssignPyObject(value, py_value);
00939             break;
00940         }
00941         case CD_PROP_FLT:
00942         {
00943             float tmp_val = PyFloat_AsDouble(py_value);
00944             if (UNLIKELY(tmp_val == -1 && PyErr_Occurred())) {
00945                 PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "expected a float, not a %.200s", Py_TYPE(py_value)->tp_name);
00946                 ret = -1;
00947             }
00948             else {
00949                 *(float *)value = tmp_val;
00950             }
00951             break;
00952         }
00953         case CD_PROP_INT:
00954         {
00955             int tmp_val = PyLong_AsSsize_t(py_value);
00956             if (UNLIKELY(tmp_val == -1 && PyErr_Occurred())) {
00957                 PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "expected an int, not a %.200s", Py_TYPE(py_value)->tp_name);
00958                 ret = -1;
00959             }
00960             else {
00961                 *(int *)value = tmp_val;
00962             }
00963             break;
00964         }
00965         case CD_PROP_STR:
00966         {
00967             MStringProperty *mstring = value;
00968             const char *tmp_val = PyBytes_AsString(py_value);
00969             if (UNLIKELY(tmp_val == NULL)) {
00970                 PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "expected bytes, not a %.200s", Py_TYPE(py_value)->tp_name);
00971                 ret = -1;
00972             }
00973             else {
00974                 BLI_strncpy(mstring->s, tmp_val, sizeof(mstring->s));
00975             }
00976             break;
00977         }
00978         case CD_MTEXPOLY:
00979         {
00980             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_AttributeError, "readonly"); /* could make this writeable later */
00981             ret = -1;
00982             break;
00983         }
00984         case CD_MLOOPUV:
00985         {
00986             ret = BPy_BMLoopUV_AssignPyObject(value, py_value);
00987             break;
00988         }
00989         case CD_MLOOPCOL:
00990         {
00991             ret = BPy_BMLoopColor_AssignPyObject(value, py_value);
00992             break;
00993         }
00994         case CD_SHAPEKEY:
00995         {
00996             float tmp_val[3];
00997             if (UNLIKELY(mathutils_array_parse(tmp_val, 3, 3, py_value, "BMVert[shape] = value") == -1)) {
00998                 ret = -1;
00999             }
01000             else {
01001                 copy_v3_v3((float *)value, tmp_val);
01002             }
01003             break;
01004         }
01005         case CD_BWEIGHT:
01006         {
01007             float tmp_val = PyFloat_AsDouble(py_value);
01008             if (UNLIKELY(tmp_val == -1 && PyErr_Occurred())) {
01009                 PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "expected a float, not a %.200s", Py_TYPE(py_value)->tp_name);
01010                 ret = -1;
01011             }
01012             else {
01013                 *(float *)value = CLAMPIS(tmp_val, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01014             }
01015             break;
01016         }
01017         case CD_CREASE:
01018         {
01019             float tmp_val = PyFloat_AsDouble(py_value);
01020             if (UNLIKELY(tmp_val == -1 && PyErr_Occurred())) {
01021                 PyErr_Format(PyExc_TypeError, "expected a float, not a %.200s", Py_TYPE(py_value)->tp_name);
01022                 ret = -1;
01023             }
01024             else {
01025                 *(float *)value = CLAMPIS(tmp_val, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01026             }
01027             break;
01028         }
01029         default:
01030         {
01031             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_AttributeError, "readonly / unsupported type");
01032             ret = -1;
01033             break;
01034         }
01035     }
01036 
01037     return ret;
01038 }
